name: Roll of the radioactive dice
description:
This game has been made for the GMTK game jam of 2022

in this short game you play as a guy who became DICE MAN!

....by getting bit by a radioactive dice?!!!?

you'll have to play to see what happens next!

this game has been made in 2 days!

if you'd like to see my main project(a fast paced kart game) here it is

https://h-dragon.itch.io/racing-league

Controls

R to restart the level

wasd to move

space to jump

left click and right click are used but you'll have to play to know why

Credits

I did most of the code but I used these assets that can be found in the unity asset store

Easy FPS

Low-Poly Simple Nature Pack

Dice Pack Light

Bubble Font(Free Version)

Birds' forest is the ambient music
